class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(colors)
        isChange = [colors[i] != colors[(i + 1) % n] for i in range(n)]
        # print(isChange)
        
        st = ans = 0
        while st < n:
            if not isChange[st]:
                st += 1
                continue
            r = st + 1

            while r < n - 1 + k - 1 and isChange[r % n]:
                r += 1
            # print(st, r)
            ans += max(0, r - st + 1 - (k - 1))

            st = r
        return ans
